t: Buyers can't see my colour variations on Amazon product ...
s: Hi, I have created parent child variations correctly on Amazon and I have no issue highlighted. However, the child product is displayed on Amazon without showing the other colour option. I have searched the forum and watched many videos and still can’t understand what I have done wrong.

hello to all, I really need help, I will try to be clear and brief, I have created a parent product and several children .... the names and colors of my variants are correct in the title and description, but not in the options of color. example, I have a matte black and a gloss black. they ...

If the products are different (colour) then you need them to be having different EAN codes, it is against the rules to offer materially different products under the same EAN

On the main product page, select the your color of choice just below the color indicator text by clicking on the image with your color of choice. After you click the image, the image will be highlighted with an orange boarder and your color of choice will remain in the color indicator text.

t: All Variants show the same images
s: Please note that under this type of variation theme, our detail page is designed in such a way that the system will pick images from one of the variant. This means that the listing is under a variation, and another child ASIN is contributing to all the products from the same size or color ...

t: How to Add a Variation to an Existing Amazon Listing (The Ultimate Guide)
s: November 6, 2024 - The variation theme is the type of variation that defines how related products differ from each other. Examples of different variation themes are size, color, flavor, etc. You may only use one variation theme per listing, but in certain categories, there are themes that combine two variations.

t: Color variations on the listing - Amazon Seller Central
